word_mean_info__list.difference: 含义较广，多指无意识地回忆起往事，也可指通过主观努力去记忆。
指有意识的下功夫把某事的整个细节都记在脑子里。
比remember文雅，指想方设法回忆已经遗忘之事。
指经某人或某事的提醒而回忆起某件已遗忘之事。
指在记忆中搜索，设法想起一时想不起的事情或人，强调过程。

bilingual.source: Now and then I look at the photo to remind myself that we need to respect all animals, because we are the visitors to their world.
bilingual.target: 我时不时看看这张照片，以提醒自己我们需要尊重所有动物，因为我们是他们世界的访客。

bilingual.source: Here are some of our favourites, to remind us that some of the English we learn in the classroom is rather different from the English in the outside world!
bilingual.target: 这里是我们的一些最爱，提醒我们在课堂上学到的英语与外界的英语有很大不同！

bilingual.source: I remind you to be careful once again.
bilingual.target: 我再一次提醒你要小心。

bilingual.source: Please remind me to bring an umbrella tomorrow.
Please remind me to attend the meeting tomorrow.
The alarm clock will remind you to wake up early.
Can you remind me of the date for the event?
bilingual.target: 你能提醒我活动的日期吗？

bilingual.source: Can you remind me where I left my keys?
bilingual.target: 你能提醒我把钥匙放在哪里了吗？

bilingual.source: The traffic units remind drivers to be safe.
bilingual.target: 交通部门提醒司机注意安全。

bilingual.source: I texted him to remind him about the meeting.
bilingual.target: 我发短信提醒他开会的事情。

list.abstract: remind（英[rɪˈmaɪnd]，美[rɪˈmaɪnd]），英语单词，动词，意思为使记起；使想起；提醒。短语搭配有remind ... of ...（使记起）。例句为“Remind people to cut down on snacking.（提醒人们少吃零食。）” remind相关近义词有jack、put in mind。
remind（Kim Sung Sik，1986年7月20日-），出生于韩国，电子竞技职业选手，是韩国在WCG《魔兽争霸》项目上的首位冠军获得者。 remind左手拿鼠标右手操作键盘，善于利用Demon Hunter进行卡位，可以一边卡位一边攻击。

yingyinNormal.en: Remind me. How old are you, now? Michael's 15.
yingyinNormal.zh: 提醒我，你现在多大了？米夏15岁。

yingyinNormal.en: Remind me, what's your birthday? October sixth.
yingyinNormal.zh: 提醒我一下，你生日是哪天？10月6号。

yingyinNormal.en: Does my face not remind you of what a grown man can do?
yingyinNormal.zh: 我脸上的疤痕没提醒你人类能做出什么事吗？

yingyinNormal.en: I just want to remind you that today is a day of celebration.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想提醒各位，今天是值得庆祝的一天。

yingyinNormal.en: No. Give that back. Need I remind you I am a yellow belt?
yingyinNormal.zh: 不行。把手机还给我，需要提醒你我是黄带吗？

yingyinNormal.en: Might I remind you, you're without a country of your own.
yingyinNormal.zh: 也许我也该提醒你一下，你也是个无国籍人士。

yingyinNormal.en: Still nothing. Remind me to try again in an hour. Will do.
yingyinNormal.zh: 还是没货，一小时后提醒我再试一次。包在我身上。

yingyinNormal.en: May I remind you that you are under oath? I didn't intentionally use him.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我能提醒你是立过誓的吗？我没有刻意利用他。

yingyinNormal.en: She's here to remind us that we're here on Earth, not for a long time, but for a good time.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这种璀璨提醒我们要记得及时行乐！

yingyinNormal.en: Let me remind you of something. This place, the people who work here are nothing.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我提醒你一下，这个地方，这里的员工都不算什么。

yingyinNormal.en: Rachel? Yeah. Remind me to review with you which pot is decaf and which is regular.
yingyinNormal.zh: 瑞秋，提醒我跟你复习哪壶是低咖啡因的，哪壶不是。

yingyinNormal.en: Let me remind you of a little promise you made. "Don't go to France. I'll be there for you."
yingyinNormal.zh: 让我来提醒你给我的承诺，别去法国，我会陪你。

yingyinNormal.en: Let me remind you, ma'am. Failing to have informed us constitutes withholding of evidence.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我提醒你，女士。没告知我们已经构成了隐瞒证据。

yingyinNormal.en: Let me remind you, ma'am, the president was unconscious when this investigation began.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我要提醒你，女士，总统在这次调查开始前就已陷入昏迷……

yingyinNormal.en: May I remind you that I answer directly to M. I also have a mortgage. And two cats to feed.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我得提醒你，我直接听命于M，我有房贷要还，还有两只猫要喂。

yingyinNormal.en: Need I remind you not a lot of scientific discoveries were made by people having a good time?
yingyinNormal.zh: 需要我来提醒你没有多少科学发现是在不苦逼的情况下做到的吗？

yingyinNormal.en: No. I haven't had children, Robert, as you so kindly remind me, but I hope I do have a sense of decency.
yingyinNormal.zh: 对，我是没有孩子，罗伯特，多谢你的提醒，但我起码有正直感。

yingyinNormal.en: Remind me to never illegally purchase a firearm. While you're waiting, here's something rather odd.
yingyinNormal.zh: 提醒我千万不要非法购买武器，你在那儿等待时，这儿可是越发出奇了。

yingyinNormal.en: I want to remind you that my kids do not know that we are friendly, and I would like to keep it that way.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我想提醒你，我的孩子不知道我们认识，而且我也不想让他们知道。

yingyinNormal.en: I keep that to remind me never to go back. I just never expected that that world would find me here.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我把新闻留了下来来提醒我永远不要回头了，我没有预料到会有人找到我

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 提醒物；令人回忆的东西；提示；催单；催缴单

word_family.mean: v. 使记起；使想起；提醒；使联想起；提醒注意

sense_info_list.en: bring something, especially a commitment or necessary course of action, to the attention of someone

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Remind</highlight> the person that this is your point of view, and then invite critique.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提醒对方这是你的观点，然后邀请对方评论。

examination_example.sentence: Parents need to <highlight>remind</highlight> their children that their needs and desires may change over time, said Julie Gurner, a real estate analyst with FitSmallBusiness.com.
examination_example.sentence_trans: FitSmallBusiness.com的房地产分析师Julie Gurner说，父母需要提醒孩子，他们的需求和愿望可能会随着时间的推移而改变。

examination_example.sentence: He <highlight>reminds</highlight> himself that not every lecture can be a Nobel winner; some will be less effective than others.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他提醒自己，不是每一个讲座都能得诺贝尔奖，一些讲座的效果会逊于其他讲座。

sense_info_list.en: cause someone to think of something because of a resemblance or likeness

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 提醒物；令人回忆的东西；提示；催单；催缴单

word_family.mean: v. 使记起；使想起；提醒；使联想起；提醒注意

sense_info_list.en: cause someone to think of something because of a resemblance or likeness

examination_example.sentence: I am <highlight>reminded</highlight> of Abraham Lincoln's quote, "I don't like that man. I must get to know him better."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想起了亚伯拉罕·林肯的名言，“我不喜欢那个人。我必须进一步了解他。”

examination_example.sentence: I was <highlight>reminded</highlight> of this again recently listening to an interview with Nicole Haddow.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 最近，我在听Nicole Haddow的采访时再次想到了这一点。

examination_example.sentence: When students were <highlight>reminded</highlight> of a time they had been excluded in a social setting, they compensated by exaggerating their number of friends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 当学生想起曾经被社团排斥的时候，他们通过夸大朋友数量来弥补这一点。

sense_info_list.en: bring something, especially a commitment or necessary course of action, to the attention of someone

examination_example.sentence: And the best thing our parents can do is to arm their kids with knowledge and <highlight>remind</highlight> them to be careful.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我们的父母能做的最好的事情就是用知识武装他们的孩子，并提醒他们要小心。

examination_example.sentence: The fire at Notre Dame <highlight>reminds</highlight> us that we will always have challenges to overcome.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 巴黎圣母院的大火提醒我，我们永远都有需要克服的挑战。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 提醒物；令人回忆的东西；提示；催单；催缴单

word_family.mean: v. 使记起；使想起；提醒；使联想起；提醒注意

sense_info_list.en: bring something; especially a commitment or necessary course of action; to the attention of someone

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Remind</highlight> people to cut down on snacking.
They'll be checking up on you all the time, correcting "mistakes" and constantly <highlight>reminding</highlight> you to do this or that.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他们会一直检查你，纠正“错误”，并不断提醒你做这个或那个。

examination_example.sentence: Some services, however, <highlight>remind</highlight> us that life will eventually return, in some form, to normal.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 然而，一些服务也提醒我们，生活最终会以某种形式回归正常。

sense_info_list.en: cause someone to think of something because of a resemblance or likeness

examination_example.sentence: Made up of a series of white skulls (颅骨) , the painting <highlight>reminds</highlight> drivers of the effect their pollution is having on the planet.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这幅画由一系列白色头骨组成，提醒司机他们的污染正在对地球造成影响。

word_usage.usage:
①用于remind sb. of sth.和remind sth.to sb.结构中，如：
She reminds me very much of her mother.
她让我想起她的母亲。
②remind跟动词不定式的复合结构，意思是“提醒某人要做某事”：
His words reminded me to keep silent to the matter.
他的话提醒我要对此事保持沉默。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

derivative_info_list.mean: n. 提醒物；令人回忆的东西；提示；催单；催缴单

word_family.mean: v. 使记起；使想起；提醒；使联想起；提醒注意

sense_info_list.en: cause someone to think of something because of a resemblance or likeness

examination_example.sentence: Going to Mount Huangshan <highlight>reminds</highlight> me of the popular Beatles' song “The Long and Winding Road”.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 去黄山让我想起披头士乐队的流行歌曲《漫长而曲折的道路》。

examination_example.sentence: The rolling sea of clouds you see once you are at the top will <highlight>remind</highlight> you how tiny we humans are.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 一旦你登上山顶，你所看到的滚滚云海将提醒你我们人类是多么渺小。

sense_info_list.en: bring something, especially a commitment or necessary course of action, to the attention of someone

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Remind</highlight> freshmen about the first day of school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 提醒新生关于开学的第一天。

数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。
